description: This scholarship was established in 1996 and is awarded to a full-time junior or senior majoring in vocal music, who will maintain a minimum 2.75 GPA. In addition, the recipient must be actively involved in the UCO School of Music through events, programs and performances, and must demonstrate leadership in the School of Music and its programs. Eligibility Vocal music major (BM Performance, BME, or BM Music Theatre) Junior or senior Enrolling in a minimum of 12 credit hours Maintain 2.75 GPA Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator Recipient must be actively involved in the School of Music through events, programs and performances, and must demonstrate leadership in the School of Music and its programs

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
